text:
Researchers say wearing face masks dramatically reduces transmission rates of COVID-19, and can prevent a second wave of the pandemic.

We’ve all worked too hard and sacrificed too much to go backward. Let’s #MaskUpPA and stop the spread. https://t.co/u4k893IxQ3
